definition: to manage to sell/to dispose of sth (by selling)/to get property off one's hands/to find excuses (to get off a charge)/to extricate sb (from trouble)/to vindicate/to become prettier (of child)

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from

sentences.english: Desorption activating energy and pre-exponential factor were calculated.
sentences.chinese: 求出脫附活化能和指前因子。

sentences.english: Debonding was detected for hot water immersions .
sentences.chinese: 熱水浸泡後能檢驗出脫粘。
